类 JDOMSAXEventProvider

所有已实现的接口：
SAXEventProvider
public class JDOMSAXEventProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements SAXEventProvider

A SAXEventProvider that provides SAX events from a JDOM Document.

作者：
Joe Walker [joe at eireneh dot com]

for license details.

方法详细信息

provideSAXEvents

public void provideSAXEvents(org.xml.sax.ContentHandler handler)
                      throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
从接口 SAXEventProvider 复制的描述
When SAX events are required the user of this interface can call this method.

指定者：
接口 SAXEventProvider 中的 provideSAXEvents
参数：
handler - The place to send SAX events.
抛出：
org.xml.sax.SAXException
